Bookmarlet generator

Just drag this to your bookmarks, and you'll be able to use a11y.css on any page: a11y.css

Check alternate text for images

This page provides fake content with images, some have a correct alt attribute, some don't, some have an empty alt. This enables us to test the checkalts module.

  • http://references.modernisation.gouv.fr/rgaa/criteres.html#crit-1-1
